definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The deposition of fat may be general or local.
sentences.chinese: 脂肪的沉积可以是全身性的，或者是局部性。

sentences.english: But that doesn’t take into account these typesof local evolutionary events.…
sentences.chinese: 但这并没有将局部性进化事件考虑进去。

sentences.english: To take in what was actually wrong involves abandoning the idea of locality .
sentences.chinese: 要找出到底错在哪里，我们必须先扬弃局部性的想法。

sentences.english: Tangent measures can be used to describe the local behavior of a measure.
sentences.chinese: 切测度可用来刻画一个测度的局部性态。

sentences.english: How to declare a variable as thread local portably?
sentences.chinese: 如何声明一个变量作为线程局部性？

sentences.english: And so the actual physical world is nonlocal. Period.
sentences.chinese: 因此，实际的物理世界具有非局部性。

definition: to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
specific to a particular stage (of a project etc)/interim (policy etc)/occurring in stages/phased
